Reviews.Title: excellant - always room for improvement
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: toshiba L755-S5280 is a very good laptop. Did every thing I expected. A few functional improvements could be implemented. I would prefer the touch pad be centered on the case rather than centered over the typing keyboard. Positioned to the left as it is, there is not a comfortable place to rest my left wrist while using the touchpad or typing. Also, it would be a great improvement if the touch pad scrolling feature could be turned off. While using programs such as excel, I often accidentily hit the scroll feature and the file screen jumps. Other wise a very reliable unit

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel® CoreTM i3-2310M processor
64MB-1696MB dynamically allocated shared graphics memory
4GB DDR3 1333MHz memory
640GB HDD (5400rpm)
DVD-SuperMulti drive (+/-R double layer)
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite L755-S5280 Laptop, Intel Core i3 4GB / 640HD / Webcam
